summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Waterproof Natural Thick Fiber Mascara, Thick Thickening Lengthening, Dramatic Extension Voluminous Eyelashes Mascara, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day
Review Date: 2020/07/27
Store: SIKEMAY
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676838', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'}
Review Text: In my photo, the left side has 2 applications of peacock mascara, the right side has none at all, the difference in length is dramatic. This mascara glides on smoothly and clump free... HOWEVER, it’s stringy if that makes since, like the tiny fibers in it are extremely noticeable. (I attached a photo where even the wand itself is stringy.) The mascara doesn’t dry in a timely manner either. Five minutes after applying the mascara and it’s still not dry. I really wanted to love this mascara for the dramatic length it adds, however the quality is not what I expected.
Review Title: Dramatic length. Long drying time. Stringy mess.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [Marshique] Eyelash & Eyebrow Growth Serum 0.25 Fl Oz - Oil Free Formula Essence Conditioner for Extension & Perm Treatment Care
Review Date: 2020/07/28
Store: Marshique
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marshique', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 1.54 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0000'}
Review Text: The serum seems nice and was easy to apply, however there were no instructions included in the box, the box itself had no English language. I really wanted to try this product, however I can’t give you an honest review if it works because I don’t know if the product should be applied once or twice a day, before makeup or at night. Directions need to be added to the product for an honest review.
Review Title: No instructions on how to use the product.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'}
Review Text: This will actually be my third gel kit, as the others have failed to meet my expectations. This kit is about as close as you get to salon quality. The light worked well and cured the gel polish as expected. The instructions were top notch, giving you precise directions on exactly what to do. This particular kit comes with most the items you need. The items not included are - nail file, buffer, and most importantly the actual gel color. I wasn’t able to test their polish out as I didn’t realize this didn’t come with a color. However I have other gel brands and the red I chose worked with this set. I followed the instructions using all the supplies from the kit except the color and I’m very pleased with the result. I would recommend this over other brands offered at your local general stores.
Review Title: Great instructions, don’t forget to buy the gel color.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bath Pillow for Bathtub, Spa Pillows for Neck Head Shoulders Back Support, Thick Bath Tub Cushion with 6 Suction Cups Men Women Breathable Comfort 4D Air Mesh Quick Dry Headrest Bath Accessories
Review Date: 2020/08/26
Store: Azun
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Azun', 'Material': 'Mesh', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '13 x 11 x 1 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Product Dimensions': '13 x 11 x 1 inches; 11.36 Ounces'}
Review Text: Great spa like bath pillow! The pillow is plush and thick, unlike our last pillow. The material is fabric and easy to wash in the washer, so much better than our last plastic/vinyl covered tub pillow that was cold to the touch. The suction is much better and stronger on this pillow, with 6 large suction cups. The pillow also has a hanger on it for drying purposes but tucks away when in use. Hands down a great bath pillow that’s very spa like!
Review Title: My favorite spa like tub pillow!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz.
Review Date: 2020/09/01
Store: Mr. Pristine
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.21 x 2.8 x 2.3 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801832', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'}
Review Text: I ordered this for my husband as he’s quite the beard connoisseur, from shampoos and conditioners to oils and balms. He was highly pleased with this shampoo and conditioner. He likes the soft minty scent of both and enjoyed that they weren’t too strong in smell. The shampoo lathered well and to his expectations, while the conditioner helped soft the course hairs. Overall a fantastic Amazon find!
Review Title: Softly mint scented beard perfection!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Conditioner to Grow, Thicken, Moisturize and Protect Your Beard, 8.5 oz.
Review Date: 2020/09/01
Store: Mr. Pristine
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.5 x 2.36 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801825', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'}
Review Text: I ordered this for my husband as he’s quite the beard connoisseur, from shampoos and conditioners to oils and balms. He was highly pleased with this shampoo and conditioner. He likes the soft minty scent of both and enjoyed that they weren’t too strong in smell. The shampoo lathered well and to his expectations, while the conditioner helped soft the course hairs. Overall a fantastic Amazon find!
Review Title: Softly mint scented beard perfection!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Facial Kit For Women - Includes Facial Mask, Facial Makeup Wipes, Nose Strips, Facial Cleansers, Facial- Self Care Package For Women (Charcoal Facial Kit)
Review Date: 2020/09/14
Store: Golden Gift Box
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Golden Gift Box', 'Item Form': 'Strips', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Nose', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 9 x 3 inches; 2.39 Pounds', 'UPC': '758176585677'}
Review Text: This was ok spa kit. The box was cute and trendy, the facial essentials are all included. The eye mask needed more beads, it was slightly disappointing. The mask and nose strips were great. The wipes were my favorite and come in a closable pack of 60. Overall a good buy with full size items.
Review Title: Nice spa kit, eye mask could be better.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Files and Buffers
Review Date: 2020/10/05
Store: Fandamei
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.8 x 1.5 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
Review Text: Love this nail kit. I ordered this to use with my sister as we usually have a girls night of fixing each other’s hair, makeup, and nails. This will be a great addition to our girls nights and supplies everything we need. This basically like a pedicure kit the nail salon would use, as it has all the same products.
Review Title: Perfect for the at home salon
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's shopping behavior reflects a consistent preference for beauty and personal care products, with a clear interest in products that enhance appearance and provide salon-like experiences at home. Their ratings indicate a mix of satisfaction and disappointment, especially concerning product efficacy and usability, which they express in reviews detailing smooth application, ease of use, and the necessity for clear instructions. Common themes indicate a preference for items that deliver dramatic results (e.g., lengthening mascara), as well as an inclination toward natural ingredients.

Quality is emphasized across various products, with higher ratings given to those perceived as well-designed or effective, while dissatisfaction typically stems from poor instructions or subpar application experiences. Price sensitivity appears moderate; they seek value but are willing to invest in products that align with their self-care routines.

Overall, the core preferences delineate an individual who values high-quality, effective beauty solutions, appreciates clear directions, and is invested in enhancing their personal grooming rituals while also enjoying at-home spa experiences.

target_interaction.title: Absolutely loved this headband!
target_interaction.text: This headband was comfortable, honestly forgot I was even wearing it. It didn’t move around or fall down. It was extremely cute and finished my outfit perfectly for our tiny Christmas party. I will definitely be ordering for other parties!
target_interaction.title_meta: Christmas Headbands,Glitter Reindeer Antlers Headband Hair Accessories for Girls,Sequins Mouse Ears Green Bow Hairband for Women Christmas Party Cosplay Favor Headwear
